name: enhanced-multiagent-postgres-analysis
description: Enhanced Multi-Agent PostgreSQL Analysis System with MCP Integration

scripts.start-distributed: concurrently "npm run mcp-users" "npm run mcp-products" "npm run mcp-sales" "npm run start-web" --names "Users-MCP,Products-MCP,Sales-MCP,Web" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow,magenta"
scripts.create-demo-db: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('./data')) fs.mkdirSync('./data'); console.log('Demo database directory created');"
